website_summaries.verdict: A tasty treat your turtle will be excited for daily.
pros: Available in multiple sizes ranging from 3.7 ounce jars to 6.83 pound buckets
Full of vitamin C and calcium
Protein-rich floating pellets contribute to a healthy shell
Pellets float for a while and don’t cloud the water
cons: Food has a strong scent that may linger in the tank

customer_reviews.title: Turtles Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I have property on a fresh water lake. My wife and I like to feed the turtles at our dock. They love this turtle food. they come back every evening for the feeding. The other night we had 25 painted turtles. When they see us walking to the dock they start swimming in. It's nice to know that we are feeding them with something that's good for them. I've tried many other turtle food products. This in by far the most popular with our little friends.
customer_reviews.author: Captain John

customer_reviews.title: Tommy loves it
customer_reviews.text: I rescued a turtle in my alley that was headed for a major street with traffic. I put him in my backyard pond. After a few days of him forging for food by himself, I decided to spoil him with some free food. He learned really quickly that living in my yard was a bonus because it comes with yummy turtle food. He now looks for me to come out and feed him. It took exactly one feeding for this wild turtle to decide that floating turtle food is a good thing. He eats every bite of it and seems pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy London

customer_reviews.title: My turtle will only eat this food - she is picky
customer_reviews.text: My turtle loves the float sticks. they last for awhile before they end up at the bottom. my turtle won't eat any other type - she just likes these. the big barrel gives me a good amount of food for awhile to feed my aquatic turtle before I have to reorder - she's 17 years old and has a caraspace of 12 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Cfitz

customer_reviews.title: Happy turtles and they are very healthy been using this ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent turtle food. Happy turtles and they are very healthy been using this food for 7 years. Started buying on amazon and it ships quick. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: Best commercial turtle food
customer_reviews.text: I got my first turtle in the late 80's and the second one in 1999. I've tried various foods and the ReptoMin to me is the best quality and nutrition for a commercial food. I feed this along with the occasional nightcrawlers, minnows, insects, crayfish, lettuce, pickerel weed, fruit, and at times raw beef and chicken. They will eat just about anything. My first turtle lived 25+ years and the second is going on 19 years and healthy as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Grainne

customer_reviews.title: In bulk for hungry turtles
customer_reviews.text: My red-eared sliders have eaten this food from when they were the size of a 50 cent piece, and the are now about 8 inches across, and they still love it. And I love the giant tub so that I don't have to restock every few weeks. I keep one of the smaller food containers to refill from this tub as needed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing healthy food for your little ones :)
customer_reviews.text: I own a Red Eared slider, I've been feeding this specific food and others as well for about 20+ years. He is a healthy big boy with much love, I support this company and I'm glad to continue feeding this specific food for him since he seems to enjoy them very much. The stick are not to big, it can be broken in half and they do after a bit of floating in the water tend to soften up. After a bit of having them floating about try your best to scoop them up since they do tend to create a mess in the tank since the sticks tend to break apart with being untouched by the turtle.
customer_reviews.author: Whytheroses

customer_reviews.title: turtle food
customer_reviews.text: same food I've always fed my red eared slider but buying in bulk saved me money. I also give him treats regularly but this is his main diet. My daughter won him at a carnival about 5 years ago and he seems to be doing well with this food.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nutrition for Red Ear Slider Turtle.
customer_reviews.text: I was NOT compensated for this review in ANY manner. I bought this product for my Red Ear Slider turtle. It is recommended by many websites that deal with rising this type of the turtle. Red ear sliders will eat only food that is floating in water, and those sticks do. They contain all recommended nutrients to keep your turtle happy and healthy. Package is big enough (recommended feeding amount is the size of the turtle head), to last me many months. Since it it resealable, I do not have to worry about spoilage. I would definitely recommend purchasing this product if you have one (or more) red ear slider turtles.
customer_reviews.author: Estraven

customer_reviews.title: Turtles love it and no mess in turtle tank
customer_reviews.text: Flavor 5 stars because my 2 turtles really love it but I never tried it. Very easy for turtles to eat - they bite through it and then eat the other half. Doesn’t need to soften up in the water so not leaving a mess in the tank like other foods do. And the fish are eating tiny pieces if the turtles won’t go after it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this along with some dried shrimp to feed the turtles in the pond. They liked the sticks only okay. They were clearly hungry but many sticks were untouched. All of them were fighting over each other for the dried shrimp. Obviously, this is for special use (feeding wild turtles outside of homes). I can see the need to mix the sticks with other food to create a balanced and nutritious meal when feeding pet turtles.
customer_reviews.author: sapientiae

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad. Turns tank water dirty fast
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was the same type of food that I buy in the small canister size. But I noticed my turtles tank smelling bad. I kept changing water and filter, but figured out it was this food and compared the ingredients and this 1st ingredient is fish meal. The smaller vanities wheat. So, won’t be buy it this again. I have a large canister filter, can’t believe how this food makes it stink so bad so fast.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: The best food I found for my turtle they grow fantastic super healthy
customer_reviews.text: My two turtles love this food at has all the vitamins minerals they need I have brought them up on this for years and they grow very well in the summer I put them in the outdoor pond and they love this stuff and they Baskin Rock area their shells are perfect they're very strong. highly recommended if you do it indoor aquarium please make sure you have the proper UVA or UVB light as needed for their child's and well-being and heat lamp if needed. A++
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Turtle enjoys the new flavor :)
customer_reviews.text: My turtle really enjoyed these, we bought these to replace the baby turtle food it are before. It does seem that the turtle is enjoying this new food more than it enjoyed the baby turtle food. The only concern is that this food does dirty up the aquarium a lot. You can see a bunch of the food get crushed and just go into the water. This didn't happen with the previous food we had. But the turtle seems to enjoy it, so it was still a good purchase for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good turtle food, my two turtles love it so far and i will see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: GABBY

customer_reviews.title: My turtle hates this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be great because you get a large amount for the money but I think my turtle hates it. Every time I put some in her tank she comes up to it like she’s gonna eat it then she turns away quick and swims to the other side of the tank while these things just float around on top. Any other food I give her she eats it right up. Bummer for me I guess. She’s an aquatic turtle. Maybe that has something to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turtles survive in this for decades!
customer_reviews.text: My red eared sliders are now 25 years old and have eaten this since hatchlings. I also give them some small bits of cooked chicken or fish (no grease) and lettuce sometimes. I started with small containers but passed this size a few years ago and have been buying this in the lovely big white buckets, which have great storage uses afterward. Tip: dont muck up tank, feed separately in a small basin.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: My red eared slider loves this food! He always gets super excited when he hears the bottle. Anyways, you get a lot of food for the price. The container is huge. I have a 4 inch red eared slider and this would probably last 8-12 months. I'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what you're getting...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely BIG!! I didn't think it was going to be so big... I only have just 1 small turtle.. Overall very good! You will have have tons of turtle food! This has nothing to do with the product just the pricing; I signed up for subscription only because it was 2 dollars less than the reg. Price & I was charged reg. Price when they did ship... ? Makes no sense, It took such a long time to ship, almost 5 weeks. I would've never signed up for subscription to get the same price as reg. Price -smh
customer_reviews.author: Love Mom

customer_reviews.title: Luckily found a use for them.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, These food sticks taste AWFUL. They taste like freeze dried fish turds and they don’t even float. I was so excited when I got these I ran to the kitchen to get a knife and opened up the container tossing a couple sticks into the air just to watch them hit the ground. False advertising at its best. The only use I have found for this product is feeding them to my frog. She seems to like them but she’s pretty dumb so unless your pet is an idiot you might just buy pet food.
customer_reviews.author: HeyB

customer_reviews.title: Chief Otis LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can purchase these pellets in bulk. My turtle, Chief Otis, really likes these pellets. I've tried other brands and he snubs his nose at others. I will continue to buy the floating food sticks for aquatic turtles because Chief Otis approved of this message. However, I do wish Reptomin would consider using less plastic in their containers. Plastic is a great source of waste and rarely is recycled properly even if it is thrown in the recycle bin. Perhaps a paper bag could be used instead (like dog food bags).
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kierzek

customer_reviews.title: It's HUGE
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these, I didn't look at the size. I looked at the price which was similar to what I have purchase from pet stores. Imagine my surprise when the two jars came and they were about 5 times the size of what I normally purchase. Great size and super affordable. My turtle will probably have enough food for the next six months or so. Definitely will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JB Garner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Price, large container
customer_reviews.text: My turtle is still too small to eat these whole so I break them in half for him. He loves them. The price is great for the size of the container compared to in store. This jar is massive. When you look at the ounces and the price I thought small jar but this will probably last my turtle at least 6 months. I will never buy in the store again! Definitely purchase here before you go to the store!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie D D

customer_reviews.title: No floating problems.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to try as an add on item. Seem to float just fine. Turtles like them. *I like that I can hold them to hand feed them as part of my rehabilitation of two rescues red eared sliders which did not have proper handling.
customer_reviews.author: amrtine

customer_reviews.title: You have more then one turtle this is the best choice.
customer_reviews.text: i have a red ear slider turtle she loves these as well its a great source of food including other stuff turtle eats.. the price for this Tetra is huge .. should last a good year or maybe a bit more. IF you happen to have more then one turtles this is perfect the overall prices for this makes more sense then buying the smaller ones.. this will last you a long time my package came quick on time and well packaged from amazon.com part.. Definitely will buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Rell

customer_reviews.title: My yellow belly sliders love this food
customer_reviews.text: My yellow belly sliders love this food. Have had great luck with my turtles health while feeding them this food. Have tried other cheaper produces from pet store while this was out of stock and my turtles have puffed up and became sluggish and unhealthy looking. My turtles are 15 years old now. As an experienced turtle owner I highly recommend this brand and product.
customer_reviews.author: J S.

customer_reviews.title: Wow,  it lasted forever!
customer_reviews.text: First , I want to say thank you for the excellent service I have recieved on everything I have ever ordered! I have 3 full grown sliders. They love this food.. I was amazed that this bag lasted so long! I ordered this one in july and am now ordering the next one. It's a perfect size. It was early . We have no complaints! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Quantity great combo
customer_reviews.text: I can’t comment on taste except to say the turtle eats it and what he doesn’t the fish do. I can say this is good quality and quantity for the price as compared to the equivalent amount of ounces in smaller containers. To give easy comparison.. this container is the size of half a 5 gallon bucket!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price. I bought this in April of 2019 and I still have not finished the container. My pet turtle is a picky eater and he had no issues with this brand. :) I will purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Will order more
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this and didnt expect it to be such a big container for this price but I'm extremely happy and my turtles love it it's almost the size of the Clorox wipes container
customer_reviews.author: jade2010

customer_reviews.title: Our turtle doesn't like... he told me.  :-)
customer_reviews.text: Our turtle just doesn't care for this product. It would disappear after a couple days of floating around and getting stuck in the filter so I think he ate it. However, he's a shy turtle but will eat Fluker's Buffet Blend Aquatic Turtle Food from our hands.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey h.

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this to feed my frog for years. we had a mini container literally last years. I recently purchased the big container and wow its huge to the point that we will have much left over after our frog passes. great price. only thing is this stuff smells horrible lol but the frog loves it so just a human scent issue
customer_reviews.author: imhereforcactusmerch

customer_reviews.title: Aquatic turtles snappers too :) :) :)
customer_reviews.text: These are essential but I’m hearing that too much will make the turtle shell pyramid :( but I believe that is if you over feed them. My turtles definitely love them and I take care of my little ones. And the little ones they belong too lol.
customer_reviews.author: robert sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Convenient size.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad that the turtle food comes in such a big container. It is very convenient. The babies and adults alike love this food and they are all very healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: makes picky turtles eat !!!
customer_reviews.text: my turtle named Godzilla loves it !!! I was worried because he wouldn't eat anything else before I gave this to him, and now he loves to eat these 😂 great value for money too 💞 saw the retail price on Walmart for one of these and they were like, $6... 😳 so two pieces for $4 something from here... a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Gailene

customer_reviews.title: Turtle Food
customer_reviews.text: I fed this to my turtle and I haven't heard him complain. Amazon asked me to rate the flavor but I haven't bothered to taste it. The turtle hasn't described the flavor to me, but he continues to eat it. Either he is a glutton for punishment or the flavor is fine. They also asked me to rate the packaging. I thought it conveyed the sense that this was food for turtles very well and it was not made of mesh or cloth as that would make for poor packaging material.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas InDoubt

customer_reviews.title: Wild turtles love it
customer_reviews.text: Our local golf course / park has a few ponds - one had 3 turtles now there are about 20 - I feed the ducks there regularly - I threw a small hand full of pellets out and waited for some turtles to come around - by the 3rd day all 20 were waiting for me - they are so cute and they love this - the ducks fortunately leave it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Your Reptile Will Love It! Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 juvenile red slider turtles really enjoy this food. We break the sticks up a bit with a mortar and pedestal as they are still small (shell measures @ 2-3 inches each) They do look enthusiastically forward to mealtime when this hits the water. Good nutritional value! Great value size and price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DaTruth2U

customer_reviews.title: My turtles like them
customer_reviews.text: I can’t exactly say the flavor is great since I’ve never tried them myself, but my 6 turtle seem to love it. Plus you hey get their added vitamins and necessary nutrients for their shells. I combine with meal worms and shrimp.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect even humans can eat them
customer_reviews.text: Turtles love these pellets, after work one day I was starving and there wasn’t any food at home so I decided to try the pellets and they were pretty good I just let them soak in water for a bit before I took bites of them myself delicious
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: My turtles love it
customer_reviews.text: I only feed them a few times a week and just enough to equal the size of their head at my reptile vet recommended other wise they get fat. I tried different brands but this they do not turn their nose up too. Been feeding them these sticks for years
customer_reviews.author: Larry Baker

customer_reviews.title: Older turtles will love it
customer_reviews.text: From my research I think this is the healthiest turtle pellets that you can find but when my turtle was smaller she hated these! Now that she’s 6 YO and about 7 inches in length she will eat these with no problem and I like that they have less protein then other brands. It’s also leaves less mess then other brands, and doesn’t leave a terrible smell in the water like I’ve dealt with before. This will become a stable in her diet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The turtles love it!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was concerned about the size of the pieces but once they are wet, they break apart quite easily. My turtles which are very small can still tear them apart perfectly fine. It's also best bang for your buck as it came in a decent size container.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Wild caught turtle can't get enough of these.
customer_reviews.text: I have a juvenile midland painted turtle which can't get enough of these, I was feeding it freeze dried meal worms with vitamins added, but this is way healthier and easier, balanced nutrition and effortless feeding. The pellets do get soggy fast, so I don't "float them", instead I put the pellets on dry land and he/she takes one at a time to the water to feed on them, it's so adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It’s mediocre as expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cheap crap food, but it keeps the turtles alive when we run out of their frozen food (it’s over an hour round trip to get it and it’s not always in stock.) It does occasionally cloud up the water and definitely creates more waste products from the turtles themselves so we try to keep it to a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: PapaPoe

customer_reviews.title: Huge Container
customer_reviews.text: Huge container! In the picture, I have it next to the one I normally buy. I am sure this will last for quite a while. Great value. Tetra products have always been a great product at a great price. Definitely recommend. Tried and true.
customer_reviews.author: KSS

customer_reviews.title: Turtle likes this food so I buy it! Good 2 year expiration from time of sale!
customer_reviews.text: Great turtle food , good healthy ingredients considering most turtle food only has protein and not vitamins C or calcium , so your turtle just gets fatter and fatter. With this food you have the vitamins of calcium and C helping keep your turtles shell and health on the up and up - plus your needed proteins. Enjoy turtles !
customer_reviews.author: charlie c.

customer_reviews.title: ReptoMin — Really Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great buy! I've been feeding a Painted Water Turtle and 2 Sliders with the ReptoMin for over 14 years. Buying the small containers from the pet store got too expensive. I'm happy to buy the large bag and place the pellets into air-tight Mason Jars, until I need to open a new one. The bag has a reseal, which also works great. I need to make the most of my money for feeding littles mouths and this bag of RetroMin is SUCH a great deal! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: wendytime

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT DEPENDING ON THE BATCH
customer_reviews.text: Good product depending on the batch you receive. It seems this product has changed throughout the years and you can tell by your reptiles stool. Sometimes it seems like my reps were pooping paper. That’s not good, I can’t even explain it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My turtles love them
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 larger turtles and the gobble these up like they have never eaten before. I would suggest you do not use this as their sole source of food. I supplement them with fresh greens, live gold fish, super meal worms, and a variety of other live food. This tub will probably only last about 6 months in my case but used to last much longer when the turtles were smaller. I do like the fact that it is in bulk with a tight fitting lid so they do not become stale quickly either.
customer_reviews.author: S. Heinz

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but my turtles don't like it
customer_reviews.text: I love the large size and the container and the ease of getting food out of the container but so far my turtles will not touch this food I recommend buying a smaller package first and making sure that your turtles like it before you buy the big container
customer_reviews.author: mlph

customer_reviews.title: if you have aquatic turtles, this is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: We've had our turtles since the kid was 6. She is now 27. Been buying the large tins but go through one every 4 months. This tub should last us a year and cut feeding costs in half.
customer_reviews.author: robert Meier

customer_reviews.title: Great turtle food
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was given 3 baby turtles and we could not get them to eat. I found and bought this and as soon as I started feeding it to them, they ate right away. Great value and turtles love it. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: VALUE
customer_reviews.text: This same container costs around $17-18 at the local pet retail chain store. Got it for less than $4 here. The neighborhood turtles and even the fish all love it. I will be buying a lot of this!
customer_reviews.author: David J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Turtles and Ducks Favorite treat...
customer_reviews.text: yes they ask for it daily at leas the ducks do... The turtles cannot get to it fast enough they love it so much... Fast and dependable seller.... totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: My lake turtles LOVE the food
customer_reviews.text: Big container for the money! I live on a lake. I feed the turtles and ducks each morning. They seem to really enjoy this food because I went from feeding 5-6 turtles to 20+ now. They see me throwing food and they all come swimming to the dock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My turtles like this.
customer_reviews.text: What a deal. This container is bigger than I thought it would be. Same price as in store item but a lot bigger through amazon. Also I like turtles 🐢 This food made my turtles happy. My turtles make me happy. I will be purchasing this item again.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: I bought two cans of these a week ago and my turtles seem to really like it! The only problem that I disliked was that one of the cans had a lot of crushed up pieces. Other than that, I’m happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Turtles love it!
customer_reviews.text: My turtles love this food. The pet store by my house used to be able to order me a big bucket like this one but couldn't this year. Glad I found it on Amazon. Small enough to keep in my house and not cause a problem.
customer_reviews.author: JTeam

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, Not sure why 1 order required multiple transactions
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have been ordering it for years for my turtles. However on my most recent order which included just this item I was charged multiple times. These transactions were equal to the order total cost of the product, however it was very confusing to see the charges this way on my statement. I almost reported it as fraud. Not sure why it was done like this, but I would appreciate only 1 transaction in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy this from anywhere but here again. I was paying 4.99 for a bottle half this size at the pet store! Will definitely order again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and impressive
customer_reviews.text: My RES turtle is very picky with the type of food that she eats. At first she spat it out and after a couple of attempts, these food sticks have become one of her favorite foods. She now begs for more sticks after eating the ones I provide while completely ignoring the other pellets that I mix in during feeding time. The only problem is that the sticks sink really fast but my turtle simply goes to find them later on. Overall I'm very impressed with how inexpensive these food sticks were and how much my turtle actually enjoys eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennyfer Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Best price for turtle food !
customer_reviews.text: So happy I have found this product on here! For this size of food for this price is amazing! You guys are awesome for this!! the item is as described! No complaints will be purchasing soon again.
customer_reviews.author: Kalology organically

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I did not look at the size before I bought two of these and was impressed with the size for price. Now I will not have to worry about turtle food for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Happy Turtles makes a Happy Mom!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ReptoMin for my sliders since it was much less than pet stores. Since this purchase, I've bought the 2.64 lb bag. These pellets are part of my turtles' every day diet and the bag purchase really stretches out the price. I no longer go to the pet stores to buy their food. I will continue to buy from this vendor as long as they continue to sell at such great prices! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: wendytime

customer_reviews.title: Big bag is a great value!
customer_reviews.text: My side neck turtles love these- I take some twigs out and keep them in a smaller container for daily use. This keeps the big bag sealed most of the time, and it lasts a while!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Francis

customer_reviews.title: Was alright
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for awhile, so I’m very familiar with how it looks like. When I unsealed the bottled I noticed that the pellets were brownish green compared to the rich green color that’s on the picture of the bottle. I recall other times buying this product at the stores and remember the pellets being a rich green color. Turtle and leftover feeder minnows are eating it without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable turtle food.
customer_reviews.text: I have five aquatic turtles and being able to buy their food in bulk containers such as this one makes it so much easier on me. I also love that I could purchase it at a very affordable price. Will be purchasing more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Shasta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best price you can find on this. The amount of food in this container is actually massive, and will likely feed my 3 African clawed frogs for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money is unbeatable with this!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the price on this food! It's way cheaper than even Walmart (which is a plus). Turtles love this stuff and it has everything they need. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Tambunga

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've had my turtle for 15 years now and he will literally only eat this! The price is amazing compared to any pet store and with the amount this will last him so long!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Only brand my turtle will eat
customer_reviews.text: I've had my turtle since 2002 and this is the only brand he will eat. When I first got him, I fed him ReptoMin Baby floating food sticks (same thing, just smaller). He eats about 15 of these regular sized sticks per day and also loves the Repto shrimp treats. I've tried other brands (pellets) and he refused to eat (picky little guy). Don't put in more than your turtle will eat or you'll end up with a dirty tank and clogged filter.
customer_reviews.author: debba9802

customer_reviews.title: Good pricing & quality
customer_reviews.text: All my turtles have loved these sticks ever since they came into my family & never get sick of them! Love the fact I can get a better value buying the larger ones, which makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: bj

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, not messy, and my terrapin really likes it. My pet will eat most pellet foods but with some food it is slow and disinterested. Not true with this food, it goes right for it when feeding.
customer_reviews.author: T Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing HUGE for the price!! I’m super happy I brought it! I’ve spent way more on disappointingly small bottle of same food. This is the only brand of food my turtle will eat. I’ve signed up for monthly orders too! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sliders mixed with dry shrimp
customer_reviews.text: My turtles enjoy it! I do wish the shape was different however. The stick shape makes it less ideal to double up for use in the koy pond :). Other than that its great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hill

customer_reviews.title: my turtle love it
customer_reviews.text: I have my turtle for more than 10 years. I have been fed her in various turtle food. She likes to eat this "Tetra 29254 ReptoMin Floating Food Sticks" most. I got the ReptoMin promptly. It is almost 100% sticks in good quality. For sure, will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: TBQ

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. The size of the bag is great for the price. I have bought this brand for years for our turtles and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My turtles love this food
customer_reviews.text: My turtles have eaten this for about 6 years. It floats so they can easily eat and find the pieces. They eat them right out of my fingers!
customer_reviews.author: debi dale

customer_reviews.title: Was impressed
customer_reviews.text: Container was much bigger than I had expected, no complaints, from either me or the turtle. May take a while, but will def consider purchasing again, when needed.
customer_reviews.author: coot

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding my aquatic turtles with this product. This turtle food is reasonably priced and does the job. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Abarmard

customer_reviews.title: Really big bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a bottle of this for my aquatic frogs at the pet store for the same price....I thought this would be the same. But the bottle was HUGE compared to the pet store bottle. So it will last a really long time!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Burr

customer_reviews.title: Turtle approved!
customer_reviews.text: My turtle loves these things and this is his brand of choice. He's been eating them a few days a week for over 10 years now and hasn't had any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Turteeees love it 💜
customer_reviews.text: My turtles love this brand only I had them since 2014 they were a half size of the optimum remote (as you can see in the picture) it’s 2020 they are big now
customer_reviews.author: Natalyahstone

customer_reviews.title: Good RES turtle food.
customer_reviews.text: A descent sized canister that will last for a while. Our Red Eared Slider turtle loves these food sticks and never seems to get bored of them. We do feed other types of food, but he preferrs these the most. Food sticks can be a little long but we just break them in half and there are no choking or gagging issues. Just drop in water and they float. Speedy delivery and package arrived un-damaged. Will buy more from same seller because price is cheaper than local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Lightfighter A 3/27

customer_reviews.title: My turtle didn't like these but y'all give it a try! Great size for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Even though my turtle didn't like these I will give a positive review due to the price and quality of the product, great value for the big container, local stores like big blue and other pet store items sell these exact items for $15+ 🙄 .
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Shipper/packer has no clue. Can not wait til holidays.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and price. Turtle loves it. Packer/shipper needs to be taught how not to damage thin plastic. Genius shipped with 3-24 pack of cat food cans, destroyed plastic turtle food container and left me with 1/3 of product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great value for the price and the size! I was happily surprised when I opened my package. Would definitely recommend this product, it’s a huge bulk size container and will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: CC88

customer_reviews.title: Great price! I was paying $16
customer_reviews.text: Great price! I was paying $16.99 where I live. I am saving more than 50% and goes straight to my housr. My turtle has been eating this same food for years and she'd very healthy and big, she's 15 yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: Josi Hightower

customer_reviews.title: Damaged delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the size but, Item arrived opened and with no lid on. My entire mailbox smelled nasty. First time this has ever happened to me.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Turtle poop almost looks like this (dont let them eat it)
customer_reviews.text: My turtle Bub loves this stuff. She adapted to it immediately after being use to the pellets. The only thing i would say to be cautious about, is that after she eats she sometimes poops and they almost look identical so you gotta be quick to scoop the poop! Aside from that, the amount of food is a great value for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie C

customer_reviews.title: Best deal!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a slider turtle for over 20 years on this as a regular diet. And now that I can buy in bulk, the better for both of us!
customer_reviews.author: BWR_Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for turtle food
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been feeding my turtle these pellets for years, and had been overpaying at the pet store. This costs at most half of what you’d be paying elsewhere—what a value!
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: GIANT BOTTLE for 5bucks ! Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best value for the amount that's given. I thought the bottle would be smaller but it is GIANT! More then happy with this purchase. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: BRI.G

customer_reviews.title: Turtle loves it and so do fish
customer_reviews.text: Both my turtle and fish enjoy this food, have ordered many times, always fresh and a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly C.

customer_reviews.title: Yellow slider approved
customer_reviews.text: Having this large bag of turtle food eases my worry of running low on turtle food! Buying in bulk is always the cheaper option, and if you have multiple turtles this is a great way to make sure you have enough food! I can’t speak on the flavor but my turtles don’t seem to mind snacking on these floating food sticks for their meals.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  A food my very picky Western Painted will eat.
customer_reviews.text: We have a year old Western Painted water turtle. They are more carnivorous than Red Eared Sliders (but still need vege matter to be healthy). I have had a really hard time getting him to eat anything other than dried shrimp and insects and worried about him getting enough nutrition. We have tried lots of different turtle foods and even fish foods. But he loved this food right out of the package - it has a softer texture than the other turtle foods we have tried but doesn't disintegrate in the water. It is also in small enough pieces that he can easily eat it even though he is only 1 1/2 inches long.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great turtle food at such a great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great turtle food at such a great deal. We have 3 huge tanks and 10 turtles and this food lasts months. We have somehow become a turtle rescue as people get bored with them or do not know how to take care of them so we end up with them. This is one of the best foods to feed your turtle and I have never met a turtle who will not eat it. It is such a better deal than pet stores or even big chain stores. I will be buying another bag very soon as the bag I bought well over 4 months ago is getting low.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Big bottle that last
customer_reviews.text: They wanted me to rate flavor. I’d say a swampy, lake sort of taste with a after taste of licking a live fish. 5 stars on yelp
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Tetras been making these since the 60s
customer_reviews.text: Best deal ive found for these in a larger package. A great supliment to fresh food and mazuri water turtle diet. Variety is key here. These also work well as suplimental good for other aquatic creatures like crayfish.
customer_reviews.author: Fishy toys

product_meta.title: Tetra 29254 ReptoMin Floating Food Sticks
product_meta.description: Size:10.59 ozFor 50 years, fishkeeping enthusiasts have looked to the Tetra name for products and solutions that add ease and beauty to their home. Whether you're an experienced hobbyist or just starting out, Tetra has everything you need–-from a large variety of quality fish food and innovative equipment to test kits and decor. ReptoMin has been trusted by pet owners world-wide for over 30 years. Tetra ReptoMin Floating Food Sticks with Calcium and Vitamin C is a scientifically formulated diet for aquatic turtles, newts and frogs. The easy-to-digest formula is formulated with the latest nutritional and manufacturing technologies with precise amounts of nutrients, Calcium and Vitamin C to support vitality and good health. Use Tetra ReptoMin Floating Food Sticks to feed one to two times per day and only as much as your pet can consumer within several minutes. For a variety, we recommend trying one of the Tetra ReptoTreat foods.
feature_bullets: FOR AQUATIC TURTLES, NEWTS AND FROGS: Scientifically formulated food for small exotic pets.
DAILY DIET: Precise amounts of nutrients, calcium and Vitamin C to support vitality and good health.
PROMOTES GROWTH: Contains high-quality proteins and essential amino acids to promote healthy growth.
EASY TO DIGEST: Scientifically formulated; proven to be readily accepted by dozens of species.
USAGE: Feed 1 to 2 times per day, only as much as your pet can consume within several minutes.
Included Components: Tetra Reptomin Floating Food Sticks For Aquatic Turtles/Newts/Frogs
